extDescription: A remarkably customizable personal homepage featuring 50+ widgets, breathtaking backgrounds and much more.
newtabDescription: A customizable personal dashboard on your new tab page featuring 50+ widgets, breathtaking backgrounds and much more.

hide_ad.content: Hey! We're not crazy about ads either, but we're only able to make ProductivityTab available and continue developing features for our free users (that's you!) by showing ads. If you'd like to support ProductivityTab directly and get rid of ads for free, we would really appreciate if you upgraded to our pro version

alert.confirm_title: ¿Está seguro de que quiere hacer esto?

modal.tagline: All the sites and apps you use, in one place
modal.wrong_extension: Want ProductivityTab on your new tab page instead?
modal.wrong_extension_newtab: Want ProductivityTab on your home page instead?
modal.about: ProductivityTab's all about tabs and widgets
modal.about_desc: Tabs are pages filled with widgets - blocks that show things like the weather, news, and your email. You can customize most widgets and add as many as you want.
modal.terms: Note: By proceeding, you agree to ProductivityTab's Terms and Privacy Policy
modal.sign_in: Sign in with your Google account
modal.sign_in_desc: Sign in with your Google account before getting started to securely save your changes online.
modal.sign_in_desc2: You can stay signed out if you want, but your page won't be saved online and you won't be able to access it from other computers.
modal.have_account: It looks like you already have an account!
modal.have_account_desc: All your tabs and widgets are ready to use!
modal.get_started_desc: You're good to go! Let's get your page set up.

widgets.configure_desc: Click the wrench to open a widget's settings.
widgets.settings: Replace Link URL with your favorite site, then press Save.
widgets.move: You can reposition widgets by clicking and dragging the three dots highlighted here.
widgets.remove: To delete, simply click the red trash bin icon.

settings.intro: Now let’s add a new widget. This highlighted button is where you can access the Widget Menu.
settings.instructions: Click the new widget button on to open the widget menu!

tooltips.settings: Cambiar el aspecto y el funcionamiento de ProductivityTab
tooltips.widgets: Añadir nuevos widgets - puedes tener tantos como quieras
tooltips.editing: Show or hide the editing buttons on widgets
tooltips.links: This is a list of links, add sites you use often in the settings
tooltips.tabs: These are your tabs. You can add more in the settings
tooltips.support: Send us a message or leave a review here

settings.finished_next: Choose an option from the menu (try starting with Widgets) and set your page up!
settings.finished_contact: Use the support link if you need any help and we'll get back to you ASAP.

storage.signin: Sign in with Google now to securely save and sync your configuration

signin_confirm.title: Keep local data?
signin_confirm.desc: Would you like to keep your local data, and replace the configuration in your account with it, or replace this computer's configuration with the one already in your account?

storage.signout_confirm: Signing out will erase your local backups
storage.pastdue_desc: Please update your billing information in the settings

suggestions.capture_notice: ProductivityTab handles searches you normally make from the Omnibox. You can disable this at any time from the settings

background.title: Background
background.desc: This is the image or set of images shown as a background to your tabs

layout.title: Diseño
layout.desc: Here you can adjust the type and number of columns in each tab

column_warning.column_to_grid: Changing to a grid-based layout will move all of your widgets to the top left corner.
column_warning.grid_to_column: Changing to a column-based layout will move all of your widgets to the first column.

theme.title: App theme
theme.desc: The app theme controls the style of ProductivityTab itself and all widgets

style.title: Style
style.desc: This controls the style of the toolbar.  It can either appear normally or as an out of the way button

search.title: Buscar
search.desc: These settings control how the search box and voice search function
search.engines_custom_desc: Enter a URL that queries should be sent to, with %s where the query should go.
search.omnibox_capture: Handle searches normally made in the Omnibox
search.search_tab: Open search results in a new tab

links.title: Links
links.desc: These are the items shown at the right of the toolbar

misc.link_tab: Open links in a new tab by default

tabs.desc1: Tabs are pages inside ProductivityTab. Each tab has its own set of widgets that is completely separate from every other tab.
tabs.desc2: You can switch between tabs by clicking the buttons that appear at the left and right of the screen when you move your mouse over a tab or by using the arrow keys on your keyboard.
tabs.delete_confirm: This action is irreversible. All data from all widgets in the tab will be permanently lost.

status.title: Status
status.signed_out: You are not currently signed in. Sign in with your Google account now to securely store and sync your configuration.

accounts.reset_confirm_desc: This will erase all local and synced data, there is no backup and no way to undo this.
accounts.reset_confirm_desc2: You will lose your entire current configuration on all computers connected to this account.

backups.title: Backup and restore
backups.desc: Backups are complete copies of all your tabs, settings, and widgets. They're automatically created when you first open ProductivityTab each day.
backups.desc2: Use the buttons below to roll ProductivityTab back to a particular date or download one of your backups.
backups.restore_confirm: This will overwrite all local and synced data. You will lose your entire current configuration on all computers under this account.
backups.restore_error: An error occurred while trying to parse the provided data, please try again later.

css.title: Custom CSS
css.desc: You can use CSS (definition) to customize almost any part of ProductivityTab.
css.placeholder: Enter up to 1000 characters of CSS here

debug_tools.title: Debug tools
debug_tools.desc: WARNING: These tools can erase your entire configuration in a single click. Only use them if your developer instructs you to.

widgets.desc1: Widgets have their own settings and can't be customized here.
widgets.desc2: To edit a widget's settings, follow these steps:
widgets.steps1: Move your mouse over any widget
widgets.steps2: Click the wrench icon that appears at the top right of the widget. If none appears then the widget doesn't have any settings that can be customized.
widgets.steps3: Edit any of the settings shown in the dialog that's displayed
widgets.steps4: Click Save to save your changes, or any part of the background to discard of them

promo.business: Interested in buying Pro for your business or school?
promo.themes_desc: See more of your backgrounds with dark and transparent themes
promo.bgs_desc: Bring your page to life with 20 live high-definition backgrounds
promo.widgets_desc: Take ProductivityTab to another level with maximizable widgets
promo.stocks: Realtime stocks with extended and historical information
promo.rss: Support for multiple RSS feeds per widget
promo.weather: Hourly weather forecasts up to 10 days out

checkout.title: Checkout
checkout.monthly_notice: By subscribing, you authorize ProductivityTab to charge you $4.99 every month until you cancel your subscription.
checkout.yearly_notice: By subscribing, you authorize ProductivityTab to charge you $29.99 every year until you cancel your subscription.
checkout.update_notice: Although billing cycle changes take effect immediately, you won't be charged until your current cycle ends.
checkout.thank_you: Thank you for buying ProductivityTab Pro!
checkout.thank_you2: ProductivityTab will reload in a few seconds and you'll be all set!
checkout.error: Something went wrong while trying to process your payment.
checkout.error2: Please try again later or email us at support@ichro.me
checkout.signin_desc: You need to sign in before buying Pro so we can make sure it's you

plan.title: Plan
plan.desc: You are currently subscribed to ProductivityTab Pro (%s)
plan.uneditable_desc: Business, education, and custom plans cannot be updated from within ProductivityTab. Please contact us to update or cancel your subscription.
plan.cancel_notice: Your subscription will be canceled immediately
plan.cancel_notice2: If you would like a refund, please contact us at support@ichro.me

ads.text1: ProductivityTab displays a few small ads to pay for server, support and development costs. With these ads, we can afford to offer iChrome free to everyone.
ads.text2: Here you can choose where those ads are shown, or buy ad-free to permanently remove them.
ads.text3: Ad-free is a one-time purchase that permanently removes ads from ProductivityTab wherever you're signed in. You can also upgrade to Pro for extra features in addition to an ad-free experience.
ads.already_upgraded: It looks like you've already upgraded to ad-free
ads.signin_desc: Sign in before upgrading so we can link your purchase to your account
ads.thank_you: Thank you for upgrading to ad-free!

store.instructions: Arrastrar y soltar cualquier tamaño en tu página de inicio

widgets.delete_confirm: ¿Estás seguro de que desea eliminar este widget? Esta acción es irreversible; todos los datos de este widget se perderán permanentemente.

permissions_request.title: Access required
permissions_request.desc: This widget needs extra permissions before it can be used. Grant them using the button below.

error.explanation: Something went wrong while we were trying to display this widget.
error.advice: Try reinstalling the widget or reloading the page. Contact us if you see this message often.

auth.message: You'll need to give this widget access to your account before you can use it.

settings.title: Título de widget
settings.title_placeholder: Introduzca el título de un widget o deje en blanco para ocultar
settings.account_help:
Si usted firmó en múltiples cuentas, este es el "authuser =" valor.

Por ejemplo, si está firmado en dos cuentas, jsmith1@gmail.com y jsmith2@gmail.com, el valor "authuser" para jsmith2@gmail.com interesaría 1 puesto que es la segunda cuenta (contando desde cero), que está firmado.

themes.title: Tema
themes.author: por
themes.cached: Este tema ha sido almacenados en caché y está disponible sin conexión
themes.random: Este tema muestra una imagen al azar cada vez que se carga la página
themes.random_daily: Este tema muestra una imagen escogida al azar cada día
themes.sunrise_sunset: Este tema muestra una imagen basada en la hora del día
themes.feed: Este tema muestra una imagen seleccionada diario de alimentación externo
themes.video: This theme displays a live video
themes.pro_only: This theme is only available to Pro users. Buy Pro in the settings.
themes.delete_confirm: ¿Estás seguro de que desea eliminar este tema? Esta acción es irreversible; el tema entero se perderá permanentemente.
themes.delete_error: Se ha producido un error al intentar eliminar el tema.  Inténtalo de nuevo más tarde.
themes.feed_error: Algo salió mal al intentar descargar los datos. Inténtalo de nuevo más tarde.
themes.caching: Por favor espere, almacenamiento en caché de tema...
themes.cache_error: Se ha producido un error al intentar eliminar el tema.  Inténtalo de nuevo más tarde

bginfo.pro_only: Only Pro users can download background images and videos

edit.title: Editar Tema
edit.name: Nombre de Tema
edit.image_placeholder: Introduzca una URL de la imagen de fondo
edit.image_help:
La subida de imágenes no puede ser sincronizada entre ordenadores.

Si esto es importante para usted, por favor, sube tu imagen a un servicio como imgur. Luego copie y pegue la dirección URL terminando con una extensión (por ejemplo, .jpg) y péguelo en el campo de la izquierda.
edit.color_placeholder: Introduzca el nombre de un color

scaling_options.none: No hay escalamiento (vista previa puede ser inexacta)

edit.cache_error: Se ha producido un error al intentar almacenar en caché la imagen proporcionado, por favor verifique la dirección URL.
edit.upload_error: Se ha producido un error al intentar cargar el archivo proporcionado, por favor, asegúrese de que es un tamaño razonable y una imagen.
